snippet.title: Neverwinter - Official PlayStation®4 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Neverwinter is coming to PlayStation®4 in summer 2016, delivering the fully-fledged, free-to-play role-playing game millions have experienced to the PlayStation Nation. At launch, players will have access to nine expansions of previously launched PC content and a living social world allowing another way for players to enjoy Dungeons & Dragons adventures with their friends. Neverwinter on PlayStation®4 will utilize console features including Party Chat and controls optimized for the DualShock 4. 

Neverwinter is a free-to-play action MMORPG that features fast-paced combat and epic dungeons. Players explore the vast city of Neverwinter and its surrounding countryside, learning the vivid history of the iconic city in the Forgotten Realms and battling its many enemies. Neverwinter is currently available on PC and Xbox One, available free-to-play with Gold*. Neverwinter will be launching for PlayStation 4 in 2016. 

For more information about Neverwinter, and to play now for free on PC, visit http://www.arcgames.com/en/games/neverwinter


Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/neverwintergame

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeverwinterGame/

*On Xbox, Xbox Live Gold membership (sold separately) required.
